text:
standards for carbon credit recognised by the EU or recommended by EFRAG. The definition of
recognised quality standard for carbon credit, detailed in the Annex II List of Acronyms and
Defined Terms, enumerates a list of criteria that need to be met:
(a) must be verifiable by independent third parties; and
(b) make requirements and project reports publicly available and at a minimum ensure:
(i) additionality,
(ii) permanence,
(iii) avoidance of double counting and provide rules for calculation,
